questions.content: Mag de hond mee naar binnen?
Wanneer was Xin Hua in Harlingen opgericht?

reviews.title: poorly regulated
reviews.text: Food is good price-wise but you have to be patient when you pick up there is a chance that you will have to wait more than an hour and people who come to you to order will also go for you.

reviews.title: Really bad
reviews.text: The kind of place that gets away with bad food because of the many tourists. I sent my soup back, it tasted like heated very thick sweet & sour sauce. Got told I would not get it for free, like that was my intention in sending it back! Avoid if you can (see reheated garnish photo)

reviews.title: A nice evening out and not expensive
reviews.text: Neither the Chinese nor the Indonesian food is what one could call truly authentic, but the food, is tasty, plentiful and not expensive.

reviews.title: Very pleasant restaurant.
reviews.text: Went on a Wednesday evening with a work colleague whilst staying in Harlingen on business. Found the restaurant to be clean and spacious, the service was prompt and an English translated menu was provided. The food was served promptly, generous portions and was very good. This will definitely be a place that I would return to if back in Harlingen again.

reviews.title: Friendly Service on Good Location
reviews.text: Chinese food is rarely available in Europe; the same applies to Xin Hua. They offer an extended menu with something for anybody (even some steak with fries). The quality is very good, they´re child friendly too. When eating European Style Chinese food in Harlingen, this would be the place to be.

articleContent.title: Your go-to guide for dog-friendly travel

seoInfo.metaDescription: Traveling with your dog has never been easier—or more fun. Cities across the country boast pet-friendly hotels, parks, and activities. With CESAR® brand’s mission to make the world more pet-friendly and Tripadvisor’s top-rated spots, you can plan with confidence. Whether it’s a quick getaway or a bucket-list trip, our guides help you stay, play, and explore with your pup. Grab the leash and go!

randomContentList.sponsorDisplayName: Fort Myers – Islands, Beaches and Neighborhoods

tripContent.title: Head to Fort Myers for amazing outdoor adventures
tripContent.description: Seeking adventure on your next vacation? Head to the greater Fort Myers area, where action-packed onshore and offshore activities are yours to enjoy year-round. Water sports, nature parks and wildlife excursions are just some of the highlights on this itinerary that is all about having fun in the sun.

seoInfo.metaDescription: Make every meal an adventure in Türkiye, with standout dishes that tell a thousand tales

tripContent.title: Celebrate Nevada's history, rhythm, and culture
tripContent.description: Nevada’s story is etched in historic mining towns, roadside wonders, galleries, and museums. From frontier heritage and atomic relics to glowing neon art, every stop reveals a new layer of the state's past and present. Whether you're wandering small-town streets or stepping into iconic city museums, this journey blends memory and motion in a way that’s anything but ordinary.

seoInfo.metaDescription: Berlin is nothing if not resilient, having outlasted many turbulent periods in its history. Those scars still show today in the stark distinction felt between the east and west sides of the city even though it’s been decades since the Berlin Wall came down. And for a European capital city, it’s not conventionally beautiful like Paris or London. Instead, Berlin embraces its eccentric hodgepodge of grit and glamour.

articleContent.title: A wheelchair-accessible guide to Rome and Naples

seoInfo.metaDescription: Marcela Turnage tours two of Italy’s greatest cities with her wheelchair

They say two is better than one—and in Ixtapa-Zihuatanejo, that couldn’t be more true. Ixtapa is modern and vibrant, with luxury resorts, breathtaking views, and settings surrounded by lush tropical nature. Zihuatanejo, a Pueblo Mágico, offers cobblestone streets, deep-rooted traditions, and a laid-back coastal vibe. Together, they deliver a travel experience that’s as diverse as it is authentic—earning Ixtapa-Zihuatanejo its place among Mexico’s top beach destinations.

articleContent.title: 6 things you’ll love about Radisson Hotels

seoInfo.metaDescription: You know the name, but have you experienced a Radisson hotel? Whether you’re planning an out-of-town business trip, a convenient stay for wedding guests, or a well-deserved vacation, discover six reasons Radisson is a brand travelers choose again and again.

articleContent.title: Everything you need to know about shopping in Hanoi

seoInfo.metaDescription: Here’s how to find the best souvenirs—and tailors—in Hanoi.
